Subscription.Description: Application crashes, hangs and error reporting logs.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" Path="Application"> <!-- Application Error and Hang --> <Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='Application Error' or @Name='Application Hang'] and (Level=2) and (EventID=1000 or EventID=1002)]]</Select> <!-- WER Application Crashes Reports --> <Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='Windows Error Reporting'] and Level=4 and EventID=1001]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
